name: プロデューサー
trans:
Mikoto...!
It's settled! You're in W.I.N.G.!

name: 美琴
text:
よかった……
ありがとう、プロデューサー
trans:
I'm so glad to hear that...
Thank you, Producer.

name: 美琴
trans: I really appreciate all that you've done.

name: プロデューサー
text:
それはこっちの台詞だよ
美琴が頑張ってくれた、その結果だから
trans:
Funny, I was about to say the same thing.
Because this is the result of your dedication and effort.

name: 美琴
text:
なんか、
もう優勝したみたいな雰囲気だけど
trans: Haha, look at us. Talking about it like we've already won.

name: 美琴
text: まだ、出場が決定しただけなのに
trans: We've just been selected to compete, that's all.

name: プロデューサー
text:
はは、すまん……
でも、嬉しくてさ
trans: Haha, sorry. But just that fact alone makes me so thrilled!

name: 美琴
text: ようやく、スタートラインに立てたってだけ
trans: What this means, is that we can finally take our position at the starting line.

name: 美琴
text: 私はずっと、ここに立って……
trans: I've been there so many times...

name: 美琴
text:
同じように並んだ子たちが
走り出すのを見送っていた気がする
trans: We'd line up side by side, but once the race was on, I'd always find myself seeing off the other girls as they dashed ahead.

name: 美琴
text:
走り出したと思ったのに、また
ここに戻ってきていて
trans: Even when I was convinced I had started running with them, I'd always end up back in the same place.

name: 美琴
text:
気が付いたら、
もう誰もいないような気がして
trans: And eventually, it felt like I was the only one left there.

name: 美琴
text: だけど、プロデューサーがいてくれた
trans: But I was wrong. You were there.

name: 美琴
text:
だからもしかしたら、
なれるのかもって、思ったの
trans: So I figured that maybe there's still a chance for me.

name: 美琴
text:
──パフォーマンスで、
感動を与えるようなアイドルに
trans: A chance to become that idol that moves people with her ability as a performer.
